header.note: The source node in most cases contains the sample message as written by the developer. If it looks like a dot-delimitted string such as "form.label.firstname", then the developer has not provided a default message.

trans-unit.target: %classLabel%The article"%articleTitle%" created by %articleAuthor% has just been posted on the blog. Now click the link to see it!
trans-unit.note: %articleUrl% is a placeholder %articleTitle% is a placeholder %articleAuthor% is a placeholder %classLabel% is a placeholder This text contains HTML tags, please try to keep those tags

trans-unit.target: %classLabel%An article has been published on the blog
trans-unit.note: %classLabel% is a placeholder This text contains HTML tags, please try to keep those tags

trans-unit.target: The article "%articleTitle%" written by %articleAuthor% has been published on the blog
trans-unit.note: %articleUrl% is a placeholder %articleTitle% is a placeholder %articleAuthor% is a placeholder This text contains HTML tags, please try to keep those tags
